Assumptions: Based on global averages for variables 29 & 30

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: den Herder et al 2017; % silvopasture of actively grazed lands; den Herder, M., Moreno, G., Mosquera-Losada, R. M., Palma, J. H., Sidiropoulou, A., Freijanes, J. J. S., ... & Papanastasis, V. P. (2017). Current extent and stratification of agroforestry in the European Union. Agriculture, Ecosystems & Environment, 241, 121-132.
Assumptions: Percent of grazed lands under silvopasture, see Section 3.2, p. 8

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Nair et al 2009; estimate of pasture land in the world under silvopastoral combination; Ramachandran Nair, P. K., Mohan Kumar, B., & Nair, V. D. (2009). Assumptions: Authors' estimate of total pasture lands under silvopasture globally, see p. 16

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Somarriba et al 2012; estimated area under silvopasture in Nicaragua; Somarriba, E., Beer, J., Alegre-Orihuela, J., Andrade, H. SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Somarriba et al 2012; estimated area under silvopasture in Colombia; Somarriba, E., Beer, J., Alegre-Orihuela, J., Andrade, H. SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Somarriba et al 2012; estimated area under silvopasture in Latin America; Somarriba, E., Beer, J., Alegre-Orihuela, J., Andrade, H. SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Bigelow & Borchers 2017; percentage of total US grazing area under forest grazing; Bigelow D.P. & Borchers A. (2017). Major Uses of Land in the United States, 2012. United States Department of Agriculture, Economic Information Bulletin Number 178.
